name: Untitled Space Shooter (vigneshkrishnan)
description:
Join the game's discord, to keep up with the development and hang out with fellow players: https://discord.gg/m7Gyw7W

Important: The game can break at FPS higher than 60, so I recommend using a 60Hz monitor, as VSync is turned on
